page.title: 17A day in the life of...
page.content:
{ { {John Whatmough, aged 10 years.}I get up at 7.45a.m. on a school morning.For {breakfast}I have cereal and waffles,then I go and get dressed.I go to{school}at 8.45a.m.When I get to school I do my lessons.At{dinner}time I have crisps,sandwiches and a drink.After dinner I do more lessons,then I come home.I have my tea and then go to{bed about 10p.m. }
{John Whatmough (Senior)aged 30.} I get up at different times because I {work shifts.}I work at{Kellog's}as a checker.I have two{breaks,}one for 35 mins. and one for 5 mins.In my breaks I have something to eat and read the paper.When I get home I read the paper or watch{television,}depending on the time.
